articles.title: Doctor shares warning on dangerous 'budget Ozempic' weight loss trend - ABC News
articles.description: Dr. Jennifer Ashton discusses the dangers of using laxatives to lose weight.
articles.content:
Amid continued demand for drugs used for weight loss, including Ozempic, Wegovy and Mounjaro, some people are instead turning to laxatives.
The trend of using over-the-counter laxatives as alternati… [+3465 chars]
